arabicText: ۞ إِلَيْهِ يُرَدُّ عِلْمُ ٱلسَّاعَةِ ۚ وَمَا تَخْرُجُ مِن ثَمَرَٰتٍۢ مِّنْ أَكْمَامِهَا وَمَا تَحْمِلُ مِنْ أُنثَىٰ وَلَا تَضَعُ إِلَّا بِعِلْمِهِۦ ۚ وَيَوْمَ يُنَادِيهِمْ أَيْنَ شُرَكَآءِى قَالُوٓا۟ ءَاذَنَّـٰكَ مَا مِنَّا مِن شَهِيدٍۢ
englishTranslationText:
The	knowledge	of	the	Last	Day	is	directed	
towards	Him;	and	no	fruit	comes	out	from	
its	cover,	and	nor	does	any	female	conceive	
or	give	birth,	but	with	His	knowledge;	and	
on	the	day	when	He	will	call	out	to	them,	
“Where	are	My	partners?”	They	will	say,	
“We	have	told	you	that	none	among	us	can	
testify.”
romanUrduTranslationText:
Qayāmat	ke	Ílm	kā	usi	par	ḥawāla	hai	aur	
koyi	phal	apne	ghilāf	se	nahiñ	nikaltā	aur	
na	kisi	māda	ko	pet	rahe	aur	na	jane	magar	
us	ke	'Ilm	se	aur	jis	din	unheñ	nidā	farmāye	
gā	kahāñ	haiñ	mere	sharik	kaheñ	ge	ham	
tujh	se	kah	chuke	ke	ham	meiñ	koyi	gawāh	
nahiñ

arabicText: وَضَلَّ عَنْهُم مَّا كَانُوا۟ يَدْعُونَ مِن قَبْلُ ۖ وَظَنُّوا۟ مَا لَهُم مِّن مَّحِيصٍۢ
englishTranslationText:
And	they	have	lost	what	they	used	to	
worship	before,	and	be	sure,	they	do	not	
have	a	place	to	escape.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	gum	gayā	un	se	jise	pahle	poojte	they	
aur	samjh	liye	ke	unheñ	kahiñ		bhāgne	ki	
jagah	nahiñ.

arabicText: لَّا يَسْـَٔمُ ٱلْإِنسَـٰنُ مِن دُعَآءِ ٱلْخَيْرِ وَإِن مَّسَّهُ ٱلشَّرُّ فَيَـُٔوسٌۭ قَنُوطٌۭ
romanUrduTranslationText:
Āadmi	bhalāyi	māñgne	se	nahiñ	uktātā	aur	
koyi	burāyi	pahuñche	to	nā-ummid	āas	
totā

arabicText: وَلَئِنْ أَذَقْنَـٰهُ رَحْمَةًۭ مِّنَّا مِنۢ بَعْدِ ضَرَّآءَ مَسَّتْهُ لَيَقُولَنَّ هَـٰذَا لِى وَمَآ أَظُنُّ ٱلسَّاعَةَ قَآئِمَةًۭ وَلَئِن رُّجِعْتُ إِلَىٰ رَبِّىٓ إِنَّ لِى عِندَهُۥ لَلْحُسْنَىٰ ۚ فَلَنُنَبِّئَنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ بِمَا عَمِلُوا۟ وَلَنُذِيقَنَّهُم مِّنْ عَذَابٍ غَلِيظٍۢ
englishTranslationText:
And	if	We	make	him	taste	Our	mercy	after	
the	hardship	which	befell	him,	he	will	say,	
“This	is	mine!	And	I	do	not	think	that	the	
Last	Day	will	ever	be	established	-	and	
even	if	I	am	returned	to	my	Lord,	with	Him	
is	only	goodness	for	me”;	so	We	shall	
indeed	inform	the	disbelievers	of	what	
they	did;	and	We	shall	indeed	make	them	
taste	a	solid	punishment.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	agar	Ham	usey	kuch	apni	Raḥmat	kā	
maza	deñ	us	taklif	ke	b'ad	jo	usey	pahuñchi	
thi	to	kahe	gā	yeh	to	meri	hai	aur	mere	
gumān	meiñ	Qiyāmat	qāim	na	ho	gi	aur	
agar	maiñ	Rab	ki	ṭaraf	lautāyā	bhi	gayā	to	
zaroor	mere	liye	us	ke	pās	bhi	khoobi	hi	hai	
to	zaroor	ham	batā	deñ	ge	kāfiroñ	ko	jo	
unhoñ	ne	kiyā	aur	zaroor	unheñ	gādhā	
'aƶāb	chakhāyeñ	ge

arabicText: وَإِذَآ أَنْعَمْنَا عَلَى ٱلْإِنسَـٰنِ أَعْرَضَ وَنَـَٔا بِجَانِبِهِۦ وَإِذَا مَسَّهُ ٱلشَّرُّ فَذُو دُعَآءٍ عَرِيضٍۢ
englishTranslationText:
And	when	We	favour	man,	he	turns	away	
and	goes	back	afar;	and	when	some	
hardship	reaches	him,	he	comes	with	a	
vast	prayer!
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	jab	Ham	āadmi	par	iḥsān	karte	haiñ	to	
muñh	pher	letā	hai	aur	apni	ṭaraf	door	hat	jātā	hai	aur	jab	usey	taklif	pahuñchti	hai	to	chaudi	du'ā	
wālā	hai

arabicText: قُلْ أَرَءَيْتُمْ إِن كَانَ مِنْ عِندِ ٱللَّهِ ثُمَّ كَفَرْتُم بِهِۦ مَنْ أَضَلُّ مِمَّنْ هُوَ فِى شِقَاقٍۭ بَعِيدٍۢ
englishTranslationText:
Proclaim	(O	dear	Prophet	Muhammad	-	peace	and	blessings	be	upon	him),	“What	is	your	opinion	-	
if	this	Qur’an	is	from	Allah	and	then	you	deny	it	-	so	who	is	more	astray	than	whoever	is	in	
extreme	opposition?”
romanUrduTranslationText:
Tum	farmāō	bhalā	batāō	agar	yeh	Qur’ān	Allāh	ke	pās	se	hai	phir	tum	is	ke	munkir	huye	to	us	se	
badh	kar	gumrāh	kaun	jo	door	ki	zid	meiñ	hai

arabicText: سَنُرِيهِمْ ءَايَـٰتِنَا فِى ٱلْـَٔافَاقِ وَفِىٓ أَنفُسِهِمْ حَتَّىٰ يَتَبَيَّنَ لَهُمْ أَنَّهُ ٱلْحَقُّ ۗ أَوَلَمْ يَكْفِ بِرَبِّكَ أَنَّهُۥ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَىْءٍۢ شَهِيدٌ
englishTranslationText:
We	shall	now	show	them	Our	signs	in	all	the	directions	and	within	their	own	selves	until	it	
becomes	clear	to	them	that	it	is	certainly	the	truth;	is	not	your	Lord	sufficient	as	a	Witness	over	
all	things?
romanUrduTranslationText:
Abhi	Ham	unheñ	dikhāyeñ	ge	apni	Āayateñ	duniyā	bhar	meiñ	aur	khud	un	ke	āape	meiñ	yahāñ	
tak	ke	un	par	khul	jāye	ke	be-shak	woh	ḥaq	hai	kiyā	tumhāre	Rab	kā	har	cheez	par	gawāh	honā	
kāfi	nahiñ.

arabicText: أَلَآ إِنَّهُمْ فِى مِرْيَةٍۢ مِّن لِّقَآءِ رَبِّهِمْ ۗ أَلَآ إِنَّهُۥ بِكُلِّ شَىْءٍۢ مُّحِيطٌۢ
englishTranslationText:
Pay	heed!	They	are	certainly	doubtful	regarding	the	meeting	with	their	Lord;	pay	heed!	He	
encompasses	all	things!
romanUrduTranslationText: Suno	Unheñ	zaroor	apne	Rab	se	milne	meiñ	shak	hai	suno	woh	har	cheez	ko	muḥeeṭ	hai
